html:
2.16.25  11:45 am   What is your opinion on red radishes?

      i don't even know really what a radish is

2.16.25  9:22 am   boiling point of helium 

      i have no idea

2.16.25  9:08 am   What is the "ASK" button an acronym for?

      that's just the word ask. but if you insist, Ask Some Kwestions

2.16.25  5:14 am   is when i get older about getting older

      let's be honest, all my songs are about songwriting

2.16.25  4:40 am   let's play a language game. a

      you win

2.16.25  4:18 am   on a scale from [...] to [!!!] how [INSERT EMOTION HERE] are you

      !:.

2.16.25  2:25 am   do you want to play with me

      sure

2.16.25  1:59 am   Can squids be kids

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.16.25  1:16 am   How would i revisit somewhere i went in the past as if it's a new place?

      go there upside down?

2.16.25  12:03 am   Whats the most amount of notes you can put into a chord before you think things start to sound a bit too mushy?

      besides the bass note, i'd say if there's more than 5 notes in the mid range you're probably only hurting yourself. 2 or 3 quite often is just fine (not including the bass note)

2.15.25  11:48 pm   have you ever watched the oscar-nominated and golden globe winning television medical drama house md, which follows the story of an acerbic doctor who had- a vicodin addiction?

      no

2.15.25  10:52 pm   are your graphics supposed to mimic hallucinations or just there to spark intensity in the hearts of your viewers

      description B seems in the right neighborhood

2.15.25  10:50 pm   what is your favorite song youve made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

2.15.25  10:37 pm   what could introversion work toward/for? 

      who knows, maybe you could invent something, build something, the possibilities are limitless really

2.15.25  10:29 pm   penguins?

      thank you for saying the name of an animal. i appreciate that

2.15.25  10:26 pm   You seem to be particularly conscious of weird behaviours we all do without thinking.

     yes but surely the cost of those awarenesses would be unawarenesses of other things

      Any suggestions on how to be more aware of what we take for granted?

     no. each person will have an entirely different road map for what they notice and when. the things i've noticed and will notice might not even be the things you'd ever want to notice. heck, it might not even be what i want to notice

2.15.25  10:07 pm   on a scale from 1 to 10, how would you rate your faith in humanity?

      10

2.15.25  9:44 pm   Can you recommend some lesser known great stevie wonder songs?

      i have no idea what you're into, but the live version of 'Heaven Help Us All' (apparently from the johnny cash tv show 1970?) rocks my world, brings tears usually, in the verses. ending doesn't work for me though but that's ok. also it's better to listen to it without the video because the band is rockin pretty good but they're not on screen for some reason?

2.15.25  9:35 pm   I'm just so excited. So so excited. For your (as of now) unreleased projects and for the future in general.

      i am also

2.15.25  7:23 pm   do you have this problem, where you can only rock or roll but find it hard to do both simultaneously?

      not really, that's just word play. no one has ever been able to individually extract distinct meaning of "rock" or "roll" from the expression "rock and roll"

2.15.25  6:17 pm   how do i put my emotions into music

      no one knows this. it's like being a person. no one knows how to do it, but still anyone can do it

2.15.25  4:00 pm   are there any mixing techniques that you employ in a particular way for your style?

      how about cold hard common sense

2.15.25  3:37 pm   where do you find the inspiration for all these videos and songs?

      actually everywhere

2.15.25  3:36 pm   are there diamonds in almonds

      i doubt it

2.15.25  2:56 pm   is mind control real

      only in small doses

2.15.25  1:52 pm   what's a misnomer you find interesting?

      "i have read the terms and conditions"

2.15.25  1:12 pm   are you actually a huge gamer most of the time

     no

     because if you are i'd like to know some games you play

2.15.25  12:03 pm   why do people commit crimes

      sometimes by mistake

2.15.25  10:15 am   Should I f around and sit with this pain, examine its intricacies, and learn to bear it long enough to discover its true message-before finally leaving it behind as a wiser and more confident version of myself?

      that's one way to do it

2.15.25  8:46 am   I love everything about "the ground plane," especially the end/outro part "the happy plane is here" onwards. the tension of the chords and melodic repetition paired with the direct, almost emphatic claim that "these are happy lyrics" makes me feel so seen. I'm wondering if the song is in any way literal - as in, are you scared of flying? I really relate to the song on a metaphorical level, but also literally, because I'm really scared of flying.

     i guess that depends which vehicle it is

     I haven't gone home in 4 years (14 hr flight away), and I have to soon or I lose citizenship. Do you have any advice on getting over/through this fear? 

     sometimes it's good to look at statistics. there are shockingly few plane accidents compared to the amount of safely flown flights

2.15.25  8:23 am   how to be relaxed knowing that you have anxiety?

      maybe you can roll around in the mud

2.15.25  6:39 am   as a non native speaker I picked up the sentence i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes from you 

      in that case, let me show you a version with more refined punctuation: i was going to say "no", but, .... now that i think about it.... "yes"

2.15.25  5:57 am   Are you interested in making work that's universally enjoy or just for you?

      it would be nice to discover the common ground between what i and others both enjoy

2.15.25  5:57 am   If I marry my girlfriend, making her my wife, is she now also my ex-girlfriend?

      technically yes

2.15.25  2:46 am   what was the tempo to "and the day goes on?"

      125? i'm estsimating

2.15.25  2:00 am   can you say supercalifragilisticexpialidocious?

      i'd love to but i don't have time right now

2.15.25  1:29 am   how many boards would the mongols hoard if the mongol hordes got bored?

      all of them

2.15.25  1:13 am   bill were you ever a Democratic president that lived in Arkansas 

      no, but i can see why you would think that

2.15.25  12:17 am   i was this close (picture of fingers closely together but not outright touching) to winning in [video-game] and i'm very angry, how do i not angry

      how about destroying the game

2.15.25  12:12 am   I've been learning piano for a little while now, but up until about 2 years ago, I was almost exclusively studying classical music. However, I've more recently begun studying some (rather simple) jazz standards from the Real Book. Often, I have to practice playing the right hand melody of a piece, while playing the chords in the left hand. Usually, getting the right hand melody isn't too difficult, but it can be really challenging for me to get the chords in the left hand. It's not that I don't know the chords-most of the chords I can figure out-but that it takes me some time to figure a lot of them out; there's a whole process of analysis of the musical chord notation in front of me before I actually play the chord. This makes it so that, unless I "cheat" by writing in the names of the notes of some chords in the music, I have to stop my playing, figure out the chord, and resume playing. Do you have any tips on improving sight-reading when playing melody + chords? Is this just something that gradually improves with practice?

      things certainly improve with experience but make sure you are enjoying yourself. i don't have any specific advice about your musical situation because your background is the polar opposite of mine, so you're kind of getting at everything in reverse order from me

2.14.25  11:44 pm   can a match box

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.14.25  10:48 pm   do you ever get questions from time travelers from the future?

      no

2.14.25  9:34 pm   Feeling a little stuck in life right now, what do you recommend?

      going somewhere new

2.14.25  9:09 pm   would you describe your life as interesting?

      yes

2.14.25  7:15 pm   can i have an eponym?

      how about "bogart", as in "don't bogart the joint", named after Humphrey Bogart, who of course was famous for bogarting the damn joint

2.14.25  5:00 pm   were you dropped on your head as a small child

      heck i may have done it to myself

2.14.25  2:29 pm   How can your jingle ''just let me sleep on a pile of clothes'' touch the heart so deeply?

      you may not like this response, but i think it's probably the notes and chords used

2.14.25  2:17 pm   Do you like to wear soft clothing (because it makes you feel like you're rough in comparison)?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.14.25  1:11 pm   Why don't people celebrate saint valentine more on His Own Holiday?

      because they've never heard of him and they also don't care and are cruel to boot

2.14.25  12:39 pm   due to a long and convoluted sequence of events i ended up with a snare-side head on the batter side of my snare drum. after a few hours of play it's gotten pretty dented but the sound is not bad in my opinion

      sounds like things are going pretty good
